header.title: Optimization, Explained
header.subtitle: Find answers to common questions about AI-powered workforce optimization

q1.question: How fast do I see savings?
q1.answer: 87% of our customers see >15% reduction in labor costs within the first 30 days. Our AI starts optimizing immediately after connecting your POS system.

q2.question: Do you work with my POS?
q2.answer: We integrate seamlessly with all major POS systems including Toast, Clover, Lightspeed, and Clip. New integrations are added weekly based on customer demand.

q3.question: How long does setup take?
q3.answer: Most restaurants are up and running in under 5 minutes. Our one-click integration connects to your existing POS system automatically.

q4.question: Do I need to train my staff?
q4.answer: No training required! Our AI works behind the scenes. Staff simply follow the optimized schedules generated automatically.

q1.question: What's included in the free trial?
q1.answer: Full access to all features for 30 days. No credit card required. Cancel anytime with no obligations.

q2.question: How does pricing scale?
q2.answer: Pricing is per location. Volume discounts available for 10+ locations. Enterprise plans include dedicated support and custom features.

q3.question: What if I don't save 20%?
q3.answer: We guarantee 20% labor cost savings or your money back. Our success team works with you to ensure optimal results.

q4.question: Can I change plans anytime?
q4.answer: Yes, upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes take effect immediately with prorated billing.

q1.question: Is my data secure?
q1.answer: Yes, we're SOC 2 Type II certified and fully compliant with GDPR and CCPA regulations. Your data is encrypted in transit and at rest.

q2.question: Where is my data stored?
q2.answer: Data is stored in secure, geographically distributed data centers with 99.9% uptime SLA and automatic backups.

q3.question: Who has access to my data?
q3.answer: Only authorized personnel with legitimate business needs. All access is logged and monitored. We never sell or share your data.

q4.question: How do you handle compliance?
q4.answer: We automatically ensure compliance with local labor laws, working time directives, and break requirements across all supported regions.

q1.question: Which regions do you support?
q1.answer: We support US, EU, LATAM, and APAC markets with region-specific optimizations for tipping, regulations, and payment preferences.

q2.question: How does tip forecasting work?
q2.answer: Our AI analyzes historical tip data, party sizes, shift types, and local market conditions to predict optimal staffing for maximum tip yield.

q3.question: What about local labor laws?
q3.answer: We automatically comply with local regulations including EU working time directives, break requirements, and overtime rules.

q4.question: Do you support mobile payments?
q4.answer: Yes, especially in APAC markets where we optimize for mobile wallet preferences, resulting in 22% higher average tips.
